title: The full stage schedule for Rouleur Live
content:
It's here — the stage schedule for Rouleur Live has been confirmed — and we're really very excited by it.

We hope you're just as blown away as we are by the amazing line-up of legends and fascinating talks that we'll be hosting in London on 4-6 November. We genuinely do believe Rouleur Live is the best cycling show in the world.

Related: The Bikes and Tech to see at Rouleur Live
Related - Who to expect at Rouleur Live: See cycling's greatest stars this November

Where else can you enjoy a drink with cycling’s biggest stars, surrounded by the world’s best bicycles and memorabilia from the history of the sport?

If you haven't done so already, get your ticket now while there are still some left. Each one includes a complimentary drink* and we're currently giving away 100 free copies of Geraint Thomas's bestselling book Mountains According to G to those who have bought live tickets. If that wasn't enough, children under the age of 16 also gain free entry on Saturday.

Keeping you safe

Our full COVID guidelines can be viewed here - we will be taking a number of measures to ensure everyone's safety and will of course be operating under the current guidance.

If the situation changes and we are unable to hold the event due to changes in COVID restrictions, we will guarantee a full refund.

*excluding free U16 tickets on Saturday
